name: SMART Notebook Gallery Item File
summary: Learn about .GALLERYITEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GALLERYITEM files are delivered in a Sharable Content Object Reference Model (SCORM) format, which is an e-learning standards specification used for transferring content within learning management systems. GALLERYITEM files can be imported by double-clicking them.

description: Gallery document file used by SMART Technologies' classroom management and whiteboard software; contains one or more gallery items from a teacher's classroom database; may include clip art images, video, audio, .NOTEBOOK files, or other types of content; used for exporting gallery documents and sharing them over email or the Internet.
